actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to protect funds invested in series E United States savings bonds from inflation and to encourage persons to provide for their own security.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income all proceeds on series E United States savings bonds where the combined interest and principal on the bonds has less purchasing power than the purchase price had.

titles.title: A bill to protect funds invested in series E United States savings bonds from inflation and to encourage persons to provide for their own security.
